name: Possible DLL Hijacking of tsmsisrv.dll
description: Detects possible DLL hijacking of tsmsisrv.dll by looking for suspicious image loads, loading this DLL from unexpected locations.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel
false_positives: False positives are likely. This rule is more suitable for hunting than for generating detections.
query: FROM logs-* metadata _id, _version, _index | WHERE (dll.path == "*\\\\tsmsisrv.dll" or file.path == "*\\\\tsmsisrv.dll")
